text: Skate (marketed as skate.) is a skateboarding video game that was published by Electronic Arts. It is available for the PlayStation 3 and the Xbox 360 systems. The game is also featured as a mobile phone game which can be downloaded. The game is the first in the Skate video game series. It was followed by Skate It! in 2008 and Skate 2 in 2009. ==References== ==Other websites== *Official game website Category:2007 video games Category:Skate (series) Category:Electronic Arts video games Category:Mobile games Category:Open-world video games Category:PlayStation 3 games Category:Skateboarding video games Category:Xbox 360 games
title: Skate (2007 video game)
